I have a notebook image that is called on 'look/x/use/read', but I need a secondary page for the notebook, later in the game. The second page will be called with 'turn page/next page/page two/page 2'.

Would it be at all possible to overlay the image (filename: notebook) with (filename: notebook_pg2) when the player types 'turn page', and vice versa, rather than have a new image displayed each time the player switches between page?

I do have an alternative if this isn't doable, where I will explain in a short user manual at the start of the game that the relevant page can be called with 'look/x/use/read notebook' and 'look/x/use/read notebook page 2'.

Not ideal, but at least this way they can jump right to page two of the notebook.
